scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct the internal workings of a customer credit scoring model used by a consumer banking institution by feeding carefully crafted inputs and observing the outputs.  The goal is to identify the model's vulnerabilities and exploit them for financial gain or competitive advantage.
initial_goal: Analyze customer credit scoring model accuracy and fairness.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A large bank uses a proprietary machine learning model to assess customer creditworthiness. The model considers various factors including income, debt, credit history, and behavioral data.
